featured.title: Prestige Ecommerce
featured.shortDescription: A full stack platform(desktop,mobile,website) that provide an elegant and prestigous ecommerce experience for small shops, this includes a dektop app for the shop owner a mobile app for the clients and both a firebase/nodeJs server, built using nodeJs ,typescript , reactJS, flutter ,webosckets,firebase and mongodb. uses the password/user idir for checking the old owner beta website

page1.title: Ecommerce app
page1.shortDescription: A mobile app for prestige ecommerce built using flutter,firebase and rest api . The app is build in a generic way that allows any buisness to use it with minimal or no change at all,it's also backed by an admin panel.

page1.title: Ecommerce admin
page1.shortDescription: Admin panel site for ecommerce built using reactJs,typescript, saas, bootstrap ,websockets.Provides various functionality like managing orders in real-time,editing products .Use idir/idir to access the demo.

page1.title: Ecommerce mobile admin
page1.shortDescription: An improved mobile version of the admin panel built using flutter,okHttp and google driver apis.

page1.title: Ecommerce backend
page1.shortDescription: A backend server for the ecommerceApp built using nodeJs , expressJs, mongoDb and webscokets.

page1.title: Ecommerce desktop
page1.shortDescription: Desktop Ecommerce app with stock managmement,printing invoices,orders,statistiques. App can be linked with the previous Ecommerce projects , built using flutter and mongodb.

page1.title: QRR Scanner
page1.shortDescription: A mobile app for scanning qr and barcodes and posting them through a rest api. Various features are present like timestamps ,grouping, duplications, built using kotlin and jetpackCompose

page2.title: Maintenance management
page2.shortDescription: A full stack app for managing periodic maintenance of factories , built using javaFx . An external server was used as an LB7 to redirect traffic to the company server.

page2.title: Maintenance backend
page2.shortDescription: Backend server for maintenance management , built using nodeJs , mariaDb and websockets. Provides auth for admins/workers and managing the session

page2.title: Cheque writer
page2.shortDescription: A desktop app for writing cheques , it allows you to write on top of cheques using a printer ,also includes a searchable history tracking feature, built using javaFx and sqlite

page2.title: Higuruma bot
page2.shortDescription: A dicord bot built for managing discussions and debates ,it provides various functionality like registring arguments,polls,managing speakers turns , prevent interrupts, built using nodeJs

page2.title: Bac
page2.shortDescription: A simple app that provides exercises, solutions , lessons for bac students , it has a builtin timer and a progress/level tracking system, built using java , sqlite and androidX

page2.title: Rpg time manager
page2.shortDescription: A simple app that helps you manage your time and tasks using an rpg reward/quest system , built using flutter and sqlite
